name: 13. friday (yusyus, Indian Man)
description:
You are trapped in a house. Killer is awaiting outside. You Got 50 turns to escape before he breaks in.

Use Arrow Keys to move your  character and mouse to access objects in the inventory and take actions on them like look for items, use items and combine items.

First find car key and back door key then get the hell out of this hause :D
